about.title: About
about.description: Passionate about IT development and for creations. I have developed my skills within Epitech Lille French school. Loving visual design projects, before starting IT I loved learning drawing. I really appreciate working on web and video game projects. Besides IT, I have been a climber since I was around 10 years old. That is a very important activity to me because it allow me to relax, giving my best and keeping me in good shape.
